text: Mu bayahudi harimwo abahindura amajambo yâ€™Imana bayakura aho ari bakavuga muribo bati:- turumvise kandi turiyonkoye, kandi wumve utumvirijwe, nayo ukuvuga ijambo Raaina mu kunyuruza indimi zabo kugira ngo batyoze idini, niyo bovuze bati:- turumvise kandi turagamburutse kandi wumve kandi uturabe, vyari kuba vyiza cane, mugabo Imana yarabavumye kubera ubuhakanyi bwabo, rero ntibemera atari gatoyi gusa
